title: vector686
author: vector686
content: Hello! I'd like to buy a video from clips4sale.com, but I'm unable to pay by card directly there. Also, unlike ManyVids, C4S doesnt have an option of buying videos for BTC.I'd like to ask someone to purchase a video for me (PM me in order to know which one). I'm ready to send a sum equivalent to video cost + 3$ reward.

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: Where do they bill out of?There are a lot of places where you can get a Visa / MC / AMEX gift card for BTC but they are region locked a lot of the time.Partial list here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5208530.0Due to the nature of the site I'm guessing you are a member here who does not want to come out and say who they are so you started a throwaway account.Most people are not going to want to put their own credit card in a site like this so they would probably want to get a disposable card anyway so you would have to go for more then then $3 you are offering. At that point might as well do it yourself.-Dave
